articles.author: Jennifer Ouellette
articles.title: Could microwaved grapes be used for quantum sensing? - Ars Technica
articles.description: Halved grapes boost magnetic fields, paving way for alternative microwave resonators for quantum sensing devices.

articles.author: Kevin Purdy
articles.title: Ars’ favorite games of 2024 that were not released in 2024 - Ars Technica
articles.description: The games that found us in 2024, from 2003 space sims to 2022 backyard survival.

articles.author: Charles Rollet
articles.title: ChatGPT Search can be tricked into misleading users, new research reveals - TechCrunch
articles.description: ChatGPT's new search feature can be told to generate entirely positive product summaries thanks to hidden code, new research finds.
articles.content:
ChatGPT Search, an AI-powered search engine that went live this month, can be fooled into generating completely misleading summaries, U.K. newspaper The Guardian has found.
